title: Will Eisner The Spirit 1-20 (DC)
description:
Will Eisner's The Spirit 1-20 + Batman/Spirit one-shot (DC)

The Spirit is a a comic series and a character created by Will Eisner in the early 1940s and it was featured as a comic book insert in newspaper(s) of the time. It remains a very influential piece of work to this day.

"The Spirit chronicled the adventures of a masked vigilante who fought crime with the blessing of the city's police commissioner Dolan, an old friend."
(From Wikipedia)

This torrent includes the comic book ongoing series released by DC, starting in 2007 up to the latest issue as of August 30th, and includes the 2006's Batman/Spirit one-shot that is a prelude to the series.
The Batman-Spirit one-shot was written by Jeph Loeb and illustrated by Darwyn Cooke
Issues #1-12 of new series were done by the creative team of Darwyn Cooke, J. Bone and Dave Stewart. Issue #13 included short stories by various creative teams. Issues #14-20 are written by Sergio AragonÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â©s and Marc Evanier, and illustrated initially by Mike Ploog, and then by Paul Smith.


The scans come from several sources like DCP, Minutemen and WildBlueZero. Most of them are GreenGiant-DCP scans though. 
Thanks to the scanners and original uploader(s)
